description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
number of experiment from publication
name of the participant
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee /orangutan
species subgroup at time of data collection – WKPRC chimpanzee group a or b/ etc
group of session based on the test condition presented
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
whether the participant could see the apparatus- clear/opaque
time the participant spent at the apparatus before removing the reward
whether the participant extracted some of the reward
whether the crank apparatus was touched or not
whether the reward was moved
whether the reward became visible or not
whether the reward was touched or not  by the participant
time the participant spent using the apparatus between touch crank and touch the reward
time the participant spent to move and touch the reward
time between the reward was visible and touched
time the reward was visible
